summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by setting multiple theme foreground-related CSS variables to bright white in `frontend/src/index.css`. REQ-2 is only partially evidenced: a few components/pages were updated to use `text-foreground`, but the diff does not demonstrate a comprehensive audit/removal of all hard-coded non-white Tailwind text color utilities across the entire app.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and update any hard-coded non-white text utility classes in the appâ€™s components/pages so they also render bright white (e.g., any `text-red-*`, `text-gray-*`, or similar explicit color utilities).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updates in a limited set of files (Footer, MindmapNav, SafeVideoEmbed, and a couple pages), but does not provide evidence that all components/pages were audited or that all hard-coded non-white text utilities across the app were removed/updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad global palette/background styling changes (forest-green OKLCH token system, background texture, and overlay gradient) beyond strictly making text bright white.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest non-goals state not to change background colors/textures beyond what is necessary for font color changes, but `index.css` includes extensive background and token changes (background, card, popover, accent, etc.) plus a texture and gradient overlay.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content/structure changes adding detailed contact sections (icons, email/phone/address blocks) rather than only ensuring existing footer attribution/heart renders bright white.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifically calls out the footer attribution line (including heart) rendering bright white, but the diff shows a fully built-out contact footer layout; this is UI/content expansion not explicitly requested.
